m_szDocSumamry: Editorial: SARTA breaks ground on hydrogen fuel station Our View: Agency puts Stark at forefront of emerging technology Comment Posted Jan. 6, 2016 at 9:00 AM Posted Jan. 6, 2016 at 9:00 AM Our View: Agency puts Stark at forefront of emerging technology The Stark Area Regional Transit Authority broke ground Tuesday on a hydrogen fuel station that will be the largest of its kind outside of California once it’s completed in six to eight months. The station will meet the needs of SARTA’s seven fuel-cell buses that will be in operation by the close of 2017 — the third largest fleet in the country,
